input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Expedition Scout"
Reference Product Description:
The Expedition Titanium is ready to go the distance, living up to the Timex legacy of fully equipping you for your adventures ahead while embodying the kind of tradition you can wear every day. Its key feature is its shock-resistant 38mm case rendered in true titanium, offering incredible durability while ensuring a comfortably lightweight feel on the wrist. Reinforcing its 200m water resistance are a screw-down crown and screw-on caseback that effectively keep water out, while the light gray dial features a date window at 3 o'clock and luminescent hands and hour markers for enhanced visibility in lowlight conditions. Clean and modern, itâ€™s powered by a reliable quartz movement and features a sapphire crystal for optimal clarity, a sturdy crown protector, and a smooth grain Italian leather strap ethically sourced from and gold-rated by the Leather Working Group (LWG) and complete with contrast side stitches.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Citizen Men's Watch Eco Drive Aviator AW1365-19P Web'
  - Name='Automatic Men's Watch in Steel with Black Dial - Bulova'
  - Name='Tissot Men's T-Navigator Chronograph Automatic Rubber Watch'
  - Name='Tissot Gent XL Classic'
  - Name='Men's Bulova Phantom Crystal Collection Watch 97A179'
  - Name='Tissot Men's Automatics III'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Surveyor Automatic Leather Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Suny Genesee Community College Stainless Steel Quartz Watch'
  - Name='Tissot Men's T-Race Chonograph Watch'
  - Name='Skagen Men's Sundby Quartz Analog Watch with Brown Leather Band'
  - Name='Fossil Nate Men's Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Daley Chronograph Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Frank Sinatra The Very Thought of You Stainless Steel Watch Gift Set'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Performance Watch'
  - Name='Hamilton Men's Khaki Field Expedition Auto 41mm Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Classic Stainless Steel Quartz Watch with Diamonds'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Military Style Wind Up'
  - Name='Bulova Women's Sutton Automatic Leather Watch'
  - Name='Tissot Men's PRC 200 Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Brox Multifunction Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Men's Orient Sport Watch RA-AK0405Y10B'
  - Name='Tissot Men's Telemeter Chronograph Watch'
  - Name='Skagen Horizont SKW6702 Men's Quartz'
  - Name='Tissot Men's T-Navigator Automatic Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Tissot Men's T-Race MotoGP Automatic Chronograph Watch'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Watch Eco Drive Aviator AW1365-19P Web
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are men's durable watches with aviation/outdoor styling and quartz movements, making them fairly relevant; however, Citizen uses Eco-Drive solar technology and likely different materials than titanium.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Automatic Men's Watch in Steel with Black Dial - Bulova
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's automatic watch in steel contrasts with the quartz movement and titanium case of the reference, reducing relevancy, though both are wristwatches designed for style and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot Men's T-Navigator Chronograph Automatic Rubber Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tissot T-Navigator offers rugged chronograph features and an automatic movement similar in outdoor utility but differs in movement and case material, lowering relevancy slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot Gent XL Classic
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A classic style watch likely focused on dress aesthetics contrasts with the rugged, adventure-themed titanium quartz reference, making it less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Bulova Phantom Crystal Collection Watch 97A179
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This Bulova appears to be more of a dress watch with crystal elements, so it's less relevant compared to the durable, adventure-oriented titanium Expedition.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot Men's Automatics III
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An automatic Tissot watch with classic style diverges from the quartz, titanium, shock-resistant design, but shares some wristwatch commonality.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Surveyor Automatic Leather Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Features automatic movement and leather strap similar to the reference's leather but differs on movement type and case material, moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Suny Genesee Community College Stainless Steel Quartz Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quartz movement aligns but uses stainless steel not titanium and likely less rugged, reducing relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot Men's T-Race Chonograph Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sports chronograph with sporty stylings, but differing movement and construction materials lower relevancy versus titanium quartz explorer style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Men's Sundby Quartz Analog Watch with Brown Leather Band
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shares quartz movement and leather strap with the reference, but less emphasis on ruggedness or titanium case.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Nate Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fossil Nate is durable quartz with a larger case but generally less focus on titanium or high-end durability features relevant to adventure watches.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Daley Chronograph Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chronograph quartz watch with casual styling; lacks titanium and shock resistance but shares quartz movement.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Frank Sinatra The Very Thought of You Stainless Steel Watch Gift Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A themed gift set watch with stainless steel case and likely dress styling, far less relevant to the rugged titanium quartz reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Performance Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bulova Performance line emphasizes durability and sport features, somewhat aligning with the shock-resistant, titanium, adventure reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Men's Khaki Field Expedition Auto 41mm Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very close in function and style: rugged field/expedition watch, automatic movement, durable materials; highly relevant though reference is quartz titanium, Hamilton auto steel.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Classic Stainless Steel Quartz Watch with Diamonds
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic quartz watch with decorative diamonds doesn't match the rugged, adventure-ready titanium quartz watch profile.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Military Style Wind Up
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Military style wind-up manual movement shares similar outdoor aesthetic, though different movement and case materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Women's Sutton Automatic Leather Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's dress automatic watch is less relevant due to gender targeting, automatic movement, and styling not focusing on rugged adventure.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot Men's PRC 200 Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sporty quartz watch with water resistance and durable features broadly similar to the reference, though materials and size may differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Brox Multifunction Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Multifunction quartz watch but stainless steel case and likely more fashion-oriented contrast with the titanium, adventure focus of reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Orient Sport Watch RA-AK0405Y10B
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sport watch with durable build and possibly automatic movement, similar functionally but differing on materials and movement type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot Men's Telemeter Chronograph Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chronograph with additional complications and likely steel case, less aligned with reference's simpler titanium quartz adventure watch design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Horizont SKW6702 Men's Quartz
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quartz men's watch with minimalistic styling, less rugged and no titanium, limiting similarity to the adventure-focused reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot Men's T-Navigator Automatic Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic navigator watch with sport styling shares some rugged traits but differs in movement and materials from titanium quartz.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot Men's T-Race MotoGP Automatic Chronograph Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sporty automatic chronograph watch designed for motorsport style, less focus on durable titanium quartz adventure format.
